java.lang.Object
  pt.ist.fenixframework.backend.infinispan.messaging.AbstractMessagingQueue

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jgroups.blocks.AsyncRequestHandler, org.jgroups.blocks.RequestHandler, org.jgroups.MembershipListener, ThreadPoolRequestProcessor.LoadListener, MessagingQueue
public class LocalMessagingQueue
extends AbstractMessagingQueue
implements org.jgroups.blocks.RequestHandler, ThreadPoolRequestProcessor.LoadListener

Used by Fenix Framework instances that have direct access to the cache.

2.8

Pedro Ruivo
